page.title: 13Recreation Grounds:Bracknell
page.content: Two of the major recreation grounds are situated in{Jock's Lane}and { {Braybrooke.}The one in Braybrooke is known as{Jeanses.}It has a pond to go fishing in. It has an enormous field. There are two sets of swings and a slide. There is a football pitch plus a BMX course. There is also a shop selling sweets and lollipops. Jock's Lane is a good park. There are swings to play on and there's a slide. They even have a pulley. Near the shop there is a paddling pool. Right at the end of the park is a miniature steam train that you can have a ride on. There are tennis courts and crazy golf. Last of all, there is a stream called{The Cut}with a little bridge that goes across it. They are both very popular.
